entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Suffield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
